verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> what is the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> more than any tree, <S%H6086><s%> the vine-branch <S%H2156><s%> which is among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest? <S%H3293><s%>

Shall wood <S%H6086><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> of it to make <S%H6213><s%> any work? <S%H4399><s%> or will men take <S%H3947><s%> a pin <S%H3489><s%> of it to hang <S%H8518><s%> any vessel thereon? <S%H3627><s%>

Behold, <S%H5414><s%> it is cast into the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel; <S%H402><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> its ends, <S%H7098><s%> and its midst <S%H8432><s%> is burned: <S%H2787><s%> is it profitable <S%H6743><s%> for any work? <S%H4399><s%>

Behold, <S%H8549><s%> when it was whole, it was meet <S%H6213><s%> for no work: <S%H4399><s%> how much less, <S%H784><s%> when the fire has devoured <S%H398><s%> it, <S%H2787><s%> and it is burned, shall it yet be meet <S%H6213><s%> for any work! <S%H4399><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> As the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel, <S%H402><s%> so will I give <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them; <S%H3318><s%> they shall go forth from the fire, <S%H784><s%> but the fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them; <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I set <S%H7760><s%> my face against them. <S%H6440><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> because they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass, <S%H4604><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
